game.title: Rescue the Princess
game.objective: Save the princess from the clutches of the evil dragon
game.description: The kingdom is in peril as the princess has been captured by the fearsome dragon. You, as the brave knight, must embark on a quest to rescue her and bring peace back to the land.
game.reward: A bag of gold coins and the eternal gratitude of the kingdom

tasks.description: Journey to the ancient mystical forest and retrieve the sword that can slay the dragon.
Seek out the hidden cave where the dragon has made its home.

tasks.objective: Engage in a battle with the dragon
tasks.description: Confront the dragon in a fight for the princess's freedom.
Free the princess from her captivity and ensure her safe return to the kingdom.
